text: A browser UI is a type of user interface on browsers. It was made to make browsing on the web easier, for example: Chrome's 2023 UI and Firefox's "floating tabs" UI.. the browser UI can possibly make the browser so easy to use. A good browser UI can make: browsing, changing settings and opening your search history more easier. == History == The exact date of the creation of the browser UI is unknown, but, it might have came out in the late 80s. Category:Web browsers
title: Browser UI
